verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy, holy, holy Lord God
Powerful One, heav'nly God
You look upon me
One who loves you
You've done your work with me, in me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Holy, holy, holy Lord God
Powerful One, heav'nly God
You looked upon me
In my sadness
You've made me happy, being with you
